titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the recommendations of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

calendar.text: Committee on Armed Services. Ordered to be reported without amendment unfavorably.

action.text: Committee on Armed Services. Reported to Senate by Senator Nunn unfavorably without amendment. With written report No. 103-118.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 170.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Failed of passage in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 12-83. Record Vote No: 271.

bill.summary: 7/20/1993--Introduced. Disapproves the recommendations of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission as submitted by the President on July 13, 1993.
